fmea_data.Failure Mode: the rolling fan responses irregular and in some cases the system restarts automatically without resolving the overheating issue
fmea_data.Recommended Action: Implement preventive maintenance | Improve detection methods | Add monitoring systems
fmea_data.Original Text: During operation of the CNC milling machine, the spindle motor intimately overheats despite normal load conditions. The temperature sensor sometimes reports delay or inconsistent readings and vibration level increases slightly before shutdown. The rolling fan responses irregular and in some cases the system restarts automatically without resolving the overheating issue.
